heist.concurrent.thief

Class MasterThief

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • heist.concurrent.thief.MasterThief
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class MasterThief
extends java.lang.Thread
    MasterThief is an active entity responsible from planning and prepare the Heist. It creates parties of Thieves and sends them to get Paintings from the Museum. The MasterThief does not know how many paintings exist inside each Room but knows how many rooms there are inside the Museum and where they are.

    • Field Detail

      • PLANNING_THE_HEIST

        public static final int PLANNING_THE_HEIST
        Planning the heist state. When the Master thief is in this state we is waiting for the OrdinaryThieves to be ready to start working.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • DECIDING_WHAT_TO_DO

        public static final int DECIDING_WHAT_TO_DO
        Deciding what to do state. In this state the MasterThief is deciding what is his next state based on how many thieves are available to create parties, how many rooms have been targeted and how many rooms still have paintings in them.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • ASSEMBLING_A_GROUP

        public static final int ASSEMBLING_A_GROUP
        Assembling a party state.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • WAITING_FOR_GROUP_ARRIVAL

        public static final int WAITING_FOR_GROUP_ARRIVAL
        Waiting for group arrival state. In this state the MasterThief waits for the OrdinaryThieves attacking the museum.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • PRESENTING_THE_REPORT

        public static final int PRESENTING_THE_REPORT
        Presenting report state. In this state the MasterThief signals everybody that the heist is over.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values
